revision.comment: Add third-party firmware support by FreshTomato, refresh forum thread links and remove link rot
revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=RT-AC88U |revision=(5.01) |series=AC3100 |upc=889349030349 |ean=0889349030394 |asin=B016EWKQAQ;US; |newegg=N82E16833320242 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model=WG911AA |manuf_rev=AC44 -ASU |availability=common |price=300 |est_release_date=10/30/2015 |fcc_date=05/29/2015 |fcc_id=MSQ-RTGW00 |ic_id=3568A-RTGW00 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=19 |pwr_amp=2.37-3.42 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4709C0;BCM4709C0KFEBG, UT1508 P10, E0UE-01 Z1 W; |cpu1_cspeed=1.4 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=ESMT |fla1_model=F59L1G81LA-25T |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC256M16DP-DI |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 5-pin header,, unpopulated |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, internal,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4366;BCM4366KMMLG, UE1513 P20, E1BP-01 3; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4366;BCM4366KMMLG, UE1513 P20, E1BP-01 3; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8365MB |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=8 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz RF Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SE2623L;;4;,,, 2.4GHz SPDT switch w/ LNA;Skyworks;SKY85201-11;;4;,,, 5GHz RF Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SKY85405;;4;,,, 5GHz SPDT switch w/ LNA;Skyworks;SKY85605-11;;4; |flags=MU-MIMO, NitroQAM, Link Aggregation, AiCloud, AiProtection, ASUS Router App, AiMesh, DFS (master), VHT80+80, DFS (master), DFS (slave) |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware=Asuswrt-Merlin, FreshTomato, DD-WRT (beta) |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=ASUS, ASUS_5G-1, ASUS_5G-2 |default_ssid_regex=^ASUS(_5G-[12])?.*$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=AC:9E:17 |oui_eth=AC:9E:17 }} {{TagLine|AC3100 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Gigabit Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AC88U/}} {{SupportPage|vendor=ASUS|model=RT-AC88U}}
:• '''2167''' Mbps max PHY rate per each 80MHz wide 5GHz channel, :• '''1000''' Mbps max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''3100 Mbps'' class'''
{{See also|ASUS RT-AC3100|Arcadyan}} "RT-AC88U REV 5.01" and "1517" is silkscreened on the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2807076 board]. FCC certification cites "three model numbers which are identical to each other in all aspects except for the following [characteristics]:" {| class="wikitable" style="min-width: 22.5vmax; text-align: center;" |+ style="caption-side: bottom; font-style: italic; font-weight: 500;" | * per [https://fccid.io/NCC/CCAF15LP1580T2/yEkWES4pRQM= NCC DFS Test Report No. TZ531828-15] ! style="width: 7em;" | Model No. ! LAN Ports ! Heat sink color |- | '''RT-AC88U''' | 8xRJ45 GbE | Silver/Red |- | '''RT-AC88R''' | 8xRJ45 GbE | Silver/Red |- | [[ASUS RT-AC3100|RT-AC3100]] | 4xRJ45 GbE | Silver/Black |} DFS certification and VHT80+80 support were added with a C2PC request on 3/6/2019. Actual support would probably need to come from a firmware update. The first page of the DFS Test Report lists two manufacturers: [[Askey]] and [[Compal]]. Web GUI Redirect URL: http://router.asus.com/ == Features == * Broadcom 1.4GHz Dual-core ARM processor improves USB and WAN/LAN speed * 802.11ac dual-band Wi-Fi router boosts speeds up to 3167Mbps for low-latency online gaming, smooth 4K UHD video playback and fast file-sharing * Broadcom ''NitroQAM'' technology boosts 5GHz (2167Mbps) and 2.4GHz (1Gbps) * 4x4 antenna design with ''AiRadar'' universal beamforming for improved Wi-Fi range * ''MU-MIMO'' radio technology can connect multiple ''MU-MIMO''-compatible clients at each device’s maximum speed simultaneously * ''ASUS Router App'' for network control from mobile devices * Exclusive built-in game accelerator from ''WTFast'' for supported multi-player online games * ''AiProtection'' with ''Trend Micro'' for network security, plus parental controls and privacy protection * 8 Gigabit Ethernet LAN ports, Link Aggregation up to 2Gbps == Specifications == * CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM4709C0(KFEBG) Dual-Core @ 1.4GHz (''ARM Cortex A9'') * Flash (NAND): 1x ''ESMT'' F59L1G81LA-25T 128MB * RAM: 512MB DDR3 :2x ''ESMT'' M15F2G16128A-BDB 256MB DDR3 ([https://forum.ixbt.com/post.cgi?id=attach:14:63125:187:1.jpg Mod]) * Wi-Fi: 4x4 MU-MIMO, NitroQAM™ (1024-QAM), 2.4Ghz/5GHz Dual Band (802.11abgn/ac) * Wireless radios: 2x [[Broadcom]] [https://www.broadcom.com/products/wireless/wireless-lan-infrastructure/bcm4366 BCM4366] SoC 4T4R ([https://pcper.com/2015/10/asus-rt-ac88u-mu-mimo-router-with-8-port-switch/ PCPerspective]) ** Power amplifiers: 4x [[Skyworks]] SE2623L, 33dB Gain (2.4GHz) / 4x [[Skyworks]] SKY85405, 31dB Gain (5GHz) ** Switch: 4x [[Skyworks]] SKY85201-11 SPDT (2.4GHz) / 4x [[Skyworks]] SKY85605-11 SPDT (5GHz) ** Low-Noise Amplifier: 4x ''[[NXP]] (SiGe)'' BGU7224 (2.4GHz), :::4x ''Macom'' MAAL-011078 (5GHz) * Antennae: 4x 5dBi dual band, detachable via RP-SMA connections * Switch: [[Realtek]] [https://www.realtek.com/en/products/communications-network-ics/item/rtl8365mb-vc-cg RTL8365MB] (4x GbE + RGMII) * Ports: ** WAN: 1x GbE (DHCP client, PPPoE w/ MPPE support, PPTP, L2TP or Static IP) ** LAN: 8x GbE * USB: 1x USB 3.0, 1x USB 2.0 * Applications: ''ASUSWRT, AiCloud, AiProtection'' * Services: ** Dual-stack IPv4/IPv6 ** DHCP server ** DLNA server ** VPN server ** Download Master ** Guest Network (max. 3 per band) ** High-Power mode === Power supply === [https://www.asus.com/networking-iot-servers/wifi-routers/asus-wifi-routers/rt-ac88u/techspec/ ASUS Technical Specifications] FCC certification lists five compliant power adapter models, stating "the [choice of] power adapter does not affect the results of RF tests." ([http://forum.ixbt.com/post.cgi?id=attach:14:63125:187:1.jpg hardware rev 5.01 modifications]). {| class="wikitable" |+ style="caption-side: bottom; font-style: italic; font-weight: 500;" | * per [https://fccid.io/NCC/CCAF15LP1580T2/yEkWES4pRQM= NCC DFS Test Report No. TZ531828-15] ! Part # !! AC Input !! DC Output |- | AD883J20 || 100V~240V @ 50~60Hz, 1.0A || 19V / 2.37A |- | AD2066320 || 100V~240V @ 50~60Hz, 1.0A || 19V / 2.37A |- | ADP-45BW B || 100V~240V @ 50~60Hz, 1.2A || 19V / 2.37A |- | ADP-45BW Y || 100V~240V @ 50~60Hz, 1.2A || 19V / 2.37A |- | ADP-65BW B || 100V~240V @ 50~60Hz, 1.5A || 19V / 3.42A |- | ADP-65GD B || 100V~240V @ 50~60Hz, 1.5A || 19V / 3.42A |} == News == * [http://www.cnet.com/products/asus-rt-ac88u-router/ ''Asus unveils the RT-AC88U, its first 8-port MU-MIMO Wi-Fi router'' on '''C|Net'''] * [http://www.techhive.com/article/2991380/home-networking/asus-gamer-centric-rt-ac88u-packs-more-ethernet-ports-than-any-other-80211ac-router.html ''Asus RT-AC88U packs more ethernet ports 802.11ac router'' on '''Techhive'''] * [http://www.pcper.com/news/Networking/ASUS-RT-AC88U-MU-MIMO-Router-8-Port-Switch ''ASUS RT-AC88U MU-MIMO Router with 8-Port Switch'' on '''PCper'''] (Spec.) == Reviews == * [https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32910-asus-rt-ac88u-dual-band-wireless-ac3100-gigabit-router-reviewed ''ASUS RT-AC88U Dual-Band Wireless-AC3100 Gigabit Router Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] * [https://lookgadgets.com/best/wireless-routers/#1_Asus_RT-AC88U_Feature-packed_router_with_excellent_performance ''The Best Wireless Routers for Fastest Wi-Fi Experience in 2020'' on '''LookGadgets'''] (ASUS RT-AC88U ranked #1) * [https://www.ixbt.com/comm/asus-rt-ac88u.shtml ''High-performance dual-band wireless router Asus RT-AC88U with support for 802.11ac'' on '''iXBT.com'''] (RU) * [https://foxnetwork.ru/index.php/component/content/article/216-asus-rt-ac88u.html ''Asus RT-AC88U Review'' on '''FoxNetwork.ru'''] (RU) === Forum threads === * '''SmallNetBuilder Forums:''' ** [https://www.snbforums.com/threads/maylyn-networking-asus-rt-ac88u.27534/ ASUS RT-AC88U] ** [https://www.snbforums.com/threads/rt-ac3100.27717/ ASUS RT-AC3100] * '''DD-WRT Forum:''' [https://forum.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=288784 Asus RT-AC88U AC3100] ''(DD-WRTv3.0 Firmware [https://download1.dd-wrt.com/dd-wrtv2/downloads/betas/2020/11-03-2020-r44715/asus-rt-ac88u/asus_rt-ac88u-firmware.trx Beta Build 44715 download])'' === Miscellaneous === * [https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/broadcom-announces-new-5g-wifi-chips-and-socs-for-routers-gateways-and-set-top-boxes-300015476.html ''Broadcom Announces New 5G WiFi Chips and SoCs for Routers, Gateways and Set-top Boxes'' on '''Cision by PR Newswire'''] * [https://www.anandtech.com/show/8862/quantenna-maintains-80211ac-technology-lead-as-broadcom-and-marvell-launch-new-chipsets ''Quantenna Maintains 802.11ac Technology Lead as Broadcom and Marvell Launch New Chipsets'' on '''AnandTech'''] == Images == * [https://www.cnet.com/pictures/asus-rt-ac88u-router-pictures/ ''Asus RT-AC88U router (pictures)'' on '''CNET'''] * [https://www.legitreviews.com/asus-reinvigorates-pc-gaming-at-rog-unleashed_173515 ''ASUS Reinvigorates PC Gaming at ROG Unleashed'' on '''Legit Reviews'''] ASUS RT-AC88U top.jpg|Top view ASUS RT-AC88U rear.jpg|Rear panel [[Has images::external| ]] __NOTOC__
